oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Willie Blount portrait
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Willie Blount (1767-1835). Portrait from shoulders up. Dark coart and white necktie and collar. Writing at bottom: "Willie Blount Govr from 1809 to 1815"
Governor of Tennessee, 1809-1815. Half brother to William Blount.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Blount, Willie, 1768-1835
Blount, Willie, 1768-1835;Tennessee. Governor;Tennessee. Office of the Governor
Governors
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Crayer, W.E.
